title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Educational Technology Design Using Interest-Based Challenge Task Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and job-related expertise
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners understand and apply instructional design principles at 80% proficiency or higher through engagement with interest-driven challenge tasks.

Learners complete weekly mini-projects (Week 1: Requirements Analysis, Week 2: UI Design, Week 3: Function Implementation, Week 4: Integration Testing) over four weeks and develop a final educational technology solution prototype (with at least three core functions), scoring at least 70 points based on internal evaluation criteria (Functionality 40%, Usability 30%, Innovation 30%)
Learners complete practical learning outcomes at 90% proficiency or higher through peer feedback and group collaboration.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
